Title: Object: Die Ruhe in Aegypten (Rest on the flight into Egypt)
Series: Königlich Baierischer Gemälde-Saal zu München und Schleissheim in Steindruck
Description: The holy family resting on the flight into Egypt; two putti standing to right; donkey in the background to left; after Tobar. c.1810-21 Lithograph
Producer name: Print made by: Ferdinand Piloty I
Curator's comments: See 1854,1020.1443 for comment on series. For another impression with a different address, see 1877,0210.196
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Fürst Karl von Paar, Freiherr auf Hartberg und Krottenstein (estate of)
Purchased through: A E Evans & Sons
